abstract: Clever software and smart machines are automating jobs. But a new McKinsey Global Institute study and a Harvard Business Review article point to an upside: technology as a helper and partner.

headline.main: New Research Says Robots Are Unlikely to Eat Our Jobs

snippet: Clever software and smart machines are automating jobs. But a new McKinsey Global Institute study and a Harvard Business Review article point to an upside: technology as a helper and partner.
